title: @RIOT WHY CAN I STILL NOT GET AN AMUMU POP! VINYL IN AUSTRALIA?!
body:
It's been a year. I'd really like to know why I'm able to buy N0. 2-8 but I cannot buy No. 1.

I've even purchased No. 3 (Lee Sin) twice because my Quaker Parrot chewed his hand off.

replies.body:
Not to make fun of your situation.
But it brings me genuine happiness that even the animal kingdom hates Lee Sin!

I think Amumu was an exclusive version, or special edition or something, and so rarer than the rest _(but don't quote me on that)_.

It was available~~ only by preorder~~ through gamestop by the looks and only if you bought a special collectors box, ~~though I am unsure if the box contained all the pops or the Amumu and some other stuff.~~
Ahhh i see, does that mean that OP will have to check 2nd hand sources if he still wants Amumu?

No you can still get it new. Riot literally just never released it here and Gamestop (US) doesn't ship to Australia.

http://www.gamestop.com/collectibles/toys/pop-games-league-of-legends-collectors-box/131603

Gamestop is called EB Games in Australia by the way.
Not quite, EB Games/Zing is owned by Gamestop but they are their own company and run things somewhat differently. Frankly Gamestop is a bit of a trainwreck compared to EB.
